prompt:
Create complete CSS for TechWave Solutions website.

Design specs:
- Primary: #3498DB (blue)
- Secondary: #F1C40F (orange)
- Dark: #2C3E50
- Light: #ECF0F1
- Font: Open Sans

Style these elements:
- Reset/base styles
- Navigation (fixed, dark background)
- Hero section (full height, gradient background)
- Services grid (4 cards, hover effects)
- About section
- Contact form (styled inputs)
- Footer
- Responsive (mobile-first)
- Smooth animations

Output ONLY CSS code, no explanations.
